txt.en: TBD
Blackthorn is waiting to speak with you.
Bartub is near the old Gondorian ruins in Torsbury.\n\nYou should help Blackthorn and the Rohirrim defeat Bartub.
Defeated Bartub
The bird ignores you
The Ent Blackthorn, roused by the destruction wrought by Saruman's minions, is prepared to be hasty and go to war.
The bird flies away
TBD
Talk to Blackthorn
Tell the bird to summon the Ent Blackthorn
There is a bird nearby.\n\nYou should tell the bird to warn Blackthorn that Thane Tordag needs his help.
Look for Blackthorn's messenger in Torsbury
Tell the bird to bring Blackthorn to Tordag's aid
'Hoom! The burárum will perish...!'
Defeat Bartub
'Ta-rum! That is one more burárum that will not be troubling Fangorn!\n\n'I will return now to the forest...my ire is spent, and I will no longer assert myself into the troubles of Man.'
Blackthorn's Revenge
The bird looks at you strangely, then flies off
'Ta-rum! The búrarum has perished....'
You send Blackthorn's messenger to summon the Ent to Tordag's aid
